title: Mir4 Crafting Calculator
description: Taking advantage of features such as local storage and state management, React made it possible to communicate between the different components of the page using its resources, facilitating the implementation of features such as themes, filters, and languages.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Using React and Next.js, it was to develop a multiple language website for different types of devices with flexible code by using a responsive layout with a clean architecture and reusable components.

title: EzEcommerce Fake Website
description: As required for an e-commerce site, multiple pages and components communicating with each other were necessary, making React and Next.js a perfect match. Leveraging routing and state management features were possible to accomplish the connection between multiple components and data.
